flavor: Br?singamen has always been coveted and stolen by the powerful.

flavor: Of course the duplicates don't divide - the whole planet would be crushed under gold!

flavor: Live for the rush of combat, and be reminded of your glorious death.

text: Give an enemy minion 'When dealing combat damage, deals equal damage to its controller'.

text: Give a minion Stunned until your next turn and deal 2 damage to it.
flavor: Water is everywhere, why WOULDN'T you weaponize it?
Her voice was raucous and rougher than stone, but the effect of the song was reassuring, like the solid plateau on which they camped.
text: Return an enchantment to its owner's hand and draw a card.

flavor: Information is the only currency that matters these days, and those long-lived fey have the market cornered.

Enough sense not to take you seriously and enough sass to take you down.

flavor: Never forget that enchantments the gods place upon the land have a cost.

text:

flavor: How much more can they make us give?
text: Awaken: Look at the top two cards of your opponent's deck. Pick one to go on top and the other on the bottom.

flavor: The easiest place to hide a knife is behind a smile.

text:

Gets +2/+2 when an item is used on it.
flavor: One can never be too prepared!

text: Awaken: Add a Powerful Ramen item to your hand.
flavor: Food and drink for famished bodies and tales of wisdom for ravenous minds!

text:
￼: Choose one minion without notifying opponents.
If the chosen minion dies during your opponent's turn, sacrifice this, draw a card, gain 2 temporary mana, and you may play a card.
1 mana ￼: Give a minion Agile until end of turn.
flavor: Simply put your hands in the air and say your utility slot keyphrase! Great for when you absolutely must survive a fall or get the drop on your competition.
Why so sheepish? It's a whole new ewe!
text: Transform a minion with mana cost 5 or less into a 2/2 Electric Sheep, removing all of its abilities.
Occupying minion has +1/+1 and Warded.
flavor: Flood a poor village: village stays flooded. Flood a rich neighborhood: neighborhood gets rebuilt.

text: Occupying minion has 'Breach: Gain 2 temporary mana'.
flavor: You can get just about anything there... including into trouble or hopelessly lost, but you're too savvy to let that happen, right?
Aim with your spirit, not your eyes.
text:
Lurker
Awaken: Add a Phoenix Feather item to your hand.
When an enemy minion with Agile attacks, it must first take 2 damage.
Give a minion Armor 1, Focused 2, Regen 3, Slayer 4, and Blast 5.
flavor: Good food is the fuel of creation, and to master cooking is a taste of godhood.

text:
Blast 3 
The minion in the opposite lane has its strength locked to zero.
flavor: Ev- Everyone can hear us, but nobody -body -body LISTENS.

text:
Stealth, Agile
Breach: Add a Flame Scroll item to your hand.
flavor: The ancient clans might be gone, but if you look in the right places you'll find warriors willing to engage in sabotage.
Where's the honor in prolonging a war? Aren't we here to win?
text:
Stealth, Swift
Does not take retaliatory damage when attacking.

flavor: Three arms on each windmill shuriken, cutting across three realms.
text:
Stealth, Teleport
Breach: Deal 2 damage to anyone.

flavor: I don't care what Jenkin says, when you hear me yell "porkchop sandwiches", that means you gotta get the heck outta there!
text: Return a friendly minion to its owner's hand and its mana cost gets reduced by 3 permanently.
Awaken: If this minion dies before your next turn, return it to owner's hand.
flavor: Find me anyone a Tengu has actually saved. THEN I'll believe they're protective spirits.

text: Is created with 2 more strength and 1 more health if you dealt damage to enemy players this turn.
flavor: Homeless? When you've been to the spirit realm and back, anywhere in this world is home.

text: Draw a card for every minion your opponent controls.
flavor: The realms move in cycles, attempting to find equilibrium in asymmetry, being from nonbeing.

text:
While occupied, friendly players draw an extra card each turn.
At the start of your turn, occupying minion is Suppressed until end of turn.
flavor: Standing between the fingers, I could see the true nature of things, and feel the world peering back at me.

text:
Stealth
Demise: Gain 2 temporary mana and draw a card.
flavor: As the virtual and spiritual realms encroach, it's becoming nearly impossible to differentiate the supernatural from viral marketing.

text: Awaken: Gain 2 temporary mana.
flavor: Ask not how deep the pond goes, but how high the waterfall must have climbed, to have elevated mere carp to such a state.
An untidy environment can be a reflection of your mind; today we are going to say "thank you" and "good bye" to some of this cluttered energy.
text: Awaken: Destroy an unoccupied enemy enchantment.

Gets +1/+1 when another minion dies.
At the start of your turn, gets -1/-1.
flavor: We seal off the morgue; keep it locked for at least a week and hope the accursed thing eats its fill and returns to the spirit realm.

text:
Deadly, Stealth
Minions you create get Stealth. This ability does not break Stealth.
flavor: Imagine what it would take to conquer the territory between realms...

text: Give an enemy minion Fragile 3 and 'Demise: Deal 2 damage to its controller and return Misfortune from the boneyard to its owner's hand'.

Lurker, Deadly
At the start of your turn, return the bottom Spirit minion in your boneyard to your hand.

0￼, Stealth
+1￼ at the start of your turn while in Stealth.
￼: Your opponent takes ￼ damage and discards ￼ cards. Then, disable this ability.

Stealth
Gets +2/+2 at the start of your turn while in Stealth.
flavor: Twilight wove a mantle of darkness, and as the shadows lengthened, so grew our suspicion of who or what might lie within.
Strife is etched into the iron, and generations of covetous conflict live within its folds.
text: All players' cards have their mana costs reduced by 2.
Occupying minion has '￼: Duel an enemy minion without attacking by exchanging non-combat damage equal to each others strength'.
flavor: Right up to the moment they step out of the spotlight, everyone believes they're the hero of their own story.
Meng Po's shop is at the corner of ... wait ... what was the question?
text:
Minions created in this lane get Stealth.
When you create a minion in this lane, the top minion in your deck gains Stealth permanently.
Awaken: You may move a minion in the opposite lane to any unoccupied enemy lane.
flavor: All aboard! Breathe out and you'll fit, that's the way. All aboard, got a schedule to keep!

text: Transform an enemy minion into a 0/3 Hollow and shuffle it back into its owner's deck, removing all of its abilities.
Awaken: Add an Adamant Pearl item to your hand.
flavor: A great geomancer once asked a terrapin dragon about its ancestry, to which it mirthfully replied, "It's turtles all the way back".

text:
Agile
Demise: Add a Ring of Eternity item to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Where dragons are concerned, "greed" seems natural, but I'd have rolled "need" this time if I were you.
That's the problem with greatness; they love to watch you rise, but hope to see you fall.
text:
Awaken: Add a Homeward Crown item to your hand.
Does not take retaliatory damage when attacking.

￼: +1￼ and give another minion -2/-2 until your next turn.
2￼￼: Shift a player's minions as far to the left or right as possible.

Overrun

Return all minions in your boneyard that were added during your opponent's last turn to your hand with Ephemeral and their mana costs reduced to 0.
When in the boneyard with at least 6 cards above it at the start of your turn, returns to owner's hand.

Unsuppressable
Awaken: You and your opponent discard a card.
The minion in the opposite lane is Suppressed.

Regen 2 
4 mana: Deal 4 damage to your opponent and any minion in the opposing lane.
flavor: Even the gods walk quietly when it sleeps.

text:
1￼, Slayer 2 
+1￼ at the start of your turn.
1￼￼: Deal 2 damage to minions in the opposing three lanes.
2￼￼: Deal 4 damage to another minion.
1￼￼: Fully heals itself.
Breach: Banish the top two cards of your opponent's deck.
flavor: I would do the cliché thing and tell you not to feed them, but this kind eats virtual data, so everything about our session looks like a snack.

text:
Occupying minion has 'Cannot take more than 2 damage in combat'.
When a friendly minion is created in an unenchanted lane, this enchantment moves into it.
Lurker, Agile
flavor: If the life of a stone was so dull, can we blame it for wanting to run free?
Don't you hear those roaring engines? The cry of tires on asphalt? The symphony of the drift is calling out to you, friend.
text: Occupying minion has Rush and is sacrificed if it moves.

flavor: I've seen you use magic... and you're a girl. Come on, I'm just the thing every magical girl needs!
text:
Agile
Has Immortal while adjacent to a Witch.

Overrun
All other friendly minions have +2/+2 and Overrun.
flavor: ...But between destroyed records and the death-severed chains of oral history, the fifth seal was forgotten.

text: 1 mana ￼: Give a minion -1/-1 and this artifact loses 3 durability.
flavor: Forget ceremony. Forget decoration. A weapon has but one purpose: put the target on the ground.

text:
￼: Look at the top nine cards of a player's deck.
￼: Reshuffle a player's deck.
flavor: The topography of our world; if only they could measure reality itself.

text:
Regen 1 
Awaken: Your other friendly minions get a free move action.
flavor: Neither fit or hale, neither young or frail, can themselves stay still when the melody reaches their ears.

text:
Has +2/+2 while occupying an enchantment.
When any player uses a power, return this minion to its owner's hand.
flavor: "High hoh doggo, away!"
Was it always magic or did that fire change it into a grimoire of alternate possibilities?
text: ￼: Search your deck for a card that has already been burned and add it to your hand, then shuffle a card back into your deck.

flavor: Climate change is impacting us all, senator, and your complaints are beginning to sound more like accusations.
text: All lanes opposite your Desert enchantments are enchanted with Deserts, replacing any existing enchantments.
Create a 1/1 Temple Snake in every unoccupied lane opposite an enemy minion.
flavor: The fifth sunset ends in earthquakes, but it begins with serpents.

When occupying minion dies, deal 1 damage to your opponent. If the minion was a Spirit, return an enemy minion in the opposing lane to owner's hand.
